name: Werehyena
description: The werehyena embodies the cunning of a gnoll and the ferocity of a hyena, capable of shifting between three forms: a true gnoll, a hyena-gnoll hybrid, or a pure hyena.
memorable: It can curse targets with werehyena lycanthropy, potentially creating new werehyenas from defeated foes.
goals: To ambush adversaries and spread chaos through lycanthropy.
relations: Often encountered with gnolls or other monstrous creatures.
environment: Typically found in areas where gnolls roam, such as deserts or savannas.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for effective stealth and ambushing; immune to nonmagical attacks not made with silver.
weaknesses: Vulnerable due to relatively low Armor Class against strong attacks.
attacks: Can make a bite attack that causes lycanthropy, claws attacks, or use a scimitar in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Shapechanger ability allows it to transform into different forms, enhancing its combat versatility.
senses: Has Keen Hearing and Smell, granting advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on these senses.
skills: Skilled in Stealth, allowing it to excel in ambush situations.
additional_information: Can make multiple attacks in its hybrid and gnoll forms.
Can inflict werehyena lycanthropy with its bite.
Reverts to true form upon death.
Uses cunning tactics to confuse and conquer enemies.
test_queries: humanoid that transforms into a hyena
chaotic evil monster with keen senses
